snippet: After Ernie Els shot an even-par 71 Thursday in the first round of the Frys.com Open in California, he revealed his affinity for the Oakland Athletics.
abstract: Ernie Els takes first-round lead at Frys.com Open in California; after the match, Els reveals his affinity for MLB's Oakland Athletics.
lead_paragraph: After Ernie Els shot an even-par 71 Thursday in the first round of the Frys.com Open in California, he revealed his affinity for the Oakland Athletics.

headline.seo: Bay Area Baseball Fever Grips Els, an Instant A’s Fan
headline.main: Bay Area Baseball Fever Grips Els, an Instant A’s Fan
headline.print_headline: Bay Area Baseball Fever Grips Els, an Instant Oakland A’s Fan
